DOC.brief_summary: To determine impact Interpreting Physician performance detect breast cancer , define area Receiver Operating Characteristic Curve ( ROC ) , Automated Breast Ultrasound ( ABUS ) screen mammography ( XRM ) combine , compare screen mammography alone asymptomatic woman > 50 % parenchymal density screen mammogram assign BI-RADS Assessment Category 1 ( negative ) 2 ( normal benign finding ) . The effect improve Reader performance illustrate plot ROC curve XRM alone XRM+ABUS . If Reader performance improve addition ABUS XRM , area curve ( AUC ) XRM+ABUS ( AUCXRM+ABUS ) great area curve XRM Alone ( AUCXRM Alone ) . This difference represent ∆AUCABUS . The null alternative hypothesis formally express follow : H0 : ∆AUCABUS = 0 , AUCXRM+ABUS = AUCXRM Alone The null hypothesis Reader performance unchanged addition ABUS screen mammogram assign BI-RADS Assessment Category 1 2 . HA : ∆AUCABUS ≠ 0 , AUCXRM+ABUS ≠ AUCXRM Alone The alternative hypothesis Reader performance change addition ABUS screen mammogram assign BI-RADS Assessment Category 1 2 . A statistically significant change consider equivalent statistically significant improvement estimate value AUCXRM+ABUS great AUCXRM Alone statistical significance alpha level .05 two-sided test .
DOC.brief_title: CRRS-4 Pivotal Somo•v™ ABUS ROC Reader Observer Study
DOC.detailed_description: The Clinical Retrospective Reader Study observational case-controlled , multi-reader multi-case Receiver Operating Characteristic ( ROC ) study involve approximately 16 Interpreting Physicians ( Readers ) approximately 200 breast screening case review , 164 breast screening case include primary data analysis . All primary data analysis case consist screen mammogram Automated Breast Ultrasound image reading asymptomatic female > 50 % parenchymal density screen mammogram assign BI-RADS Assessment Category 1 ( negative ) 2 ( normal benign finding ) . The Readers review total 200 case : Non-Cancer Case Set , Cancer Case Set , additional Control Supplemental Case Sets . These case randomize read session Reader review entire Case Set unique order . The primary Receiver Operating Characteristic analysis perform Readers ' Likelihood Malignancy ( LOM ) rating initial review screen mammogram alone final review screen mammogram Automated Breast Ultrasound Non-Cancer Case Set Cancer Case Set .

Does meet requirement FellowshipTrained Breast Imaging 10 year experience breast imaging radiologist 's practice least 70 % breast imaging Does meet requirement minimum Mammography Interpretation requirement per MQSA Does meet requirement Review Rate least 1,000 Mammograms annually year prior study participation Does meet requirement Review Rate least 500 Breast Ultrasounds annually year prior study participation Does meet requirement successful completion ABUS training
